$eref.description: SSL configuration. If configured data-plane calls to user services will be exposed over SSL only.

___key.description: The SSL key data in PEM format encoded as base64 string. This is not returned in response of GET/PUT on the resource.. To see this please call listKeys API.

___status.description: SSL status. Allowed values are Enabled and Disabled.

___cert.description: The SSL cert data in PEM format encoded as base64 string
